Uses of Class
com.google.cloud.firestore.CollectionReference

  • Packages that use CollectionReference 
    Package Description
    com.google.cloud.firestore  

    • Uses of CollectionReference in com.google.cloud.firestore

      Methods in com.google.cloud.firestore that return CollectionReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CollectionReference Firestore.collection(String path)
      Gets a CollectionReference that refers to the collection at the specified path.
      CollectionReference DocumentReference.collection(String collectionPath)
      Gets a CollectionReference instance that refers to the collection that is a child of this document.
      CollectionReference DocumentReference.getParent()
      A reference to the Collection to which this DocumentReference belongs to.
      Methods in com.google.cloud.firestore that return types with arguments of type CollectionReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<CollectionReference> Firestore.getCollections()
      Fetches the root collections that are associated with this Firestore database.
      Iterable<CollectionReference> DocumentReference.getCollections()
      Fetches the subcollections that are direct children of this document.
